title: Animal Sounds
subtle: Factual Description (nonfiction), 20 words, Level B (Grade K), Lexile 40L
description: Meow! Oink! Moo! Students will read about many animal sounds, including a surprising animal at the end -- a human!
reviewWords: bark, bees, birds, buzz, cats, chirp, cows, dads, dogs, ducks, hiss, lions, meow, moo, oink, pigs, quack, roar, snakes, snore
comprehension: Main Idea and Details                : Identify main idea and details
grammar: Capitalization                : Capitalize the beginning of sentences
wordWork: Onomatopoeia                : Understand that some words sound like their meaning (onomatopoeic words)
